skins.selfIntroduction: I am Belfast, born in Harland and Wolff. Yes, the same place as the Titanic. I actually have an older sister. She hasn't taken care of me very much, however... Umm, that's all I was going to say. Master, what type of person are you?
skins.acquisition: My Master is also a commander... Umm, so the commander is a captain of a ship? I don't quite understand, but... I will stay here for a while if you don't mind. I am Belfast, maid-in-training. It is a pleasure to serve you.
skins.login: Master, would you like some tea?
skins.details: To perform a curtsy, a lady puts her feet across each other like¡ª Forgive me, I failed to do it...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You'd like whiskey and coffee... Umm, d-do you not drink tea...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Master, is there anything you would like me to do?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Master, neglecting your commander duties is a big no-no!
skins.secretaryTouch: Master, you'll end up a failure if you rely on others too often. Sometimes, you must¡ª Mmh, you leave me no choice. I-I won't help you next time, okay...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don't worry, Master. Even if you go to prison, I will still bring you your meals.
